version_description:
Thank you for using the RaspberryPi App!

Things we've done in this update:
• Bugfixes and improvements

Thank you for using the RaspberryPi App!
Things we've done in this update:
• Improved design
• New tools to control your Pi
• New HelpCenter
• Updated NOOBS image
• New GPIO control
• Better user management (Force logout, groups, last login & more)
• Improved scheduled task management (switch GPIOs, etc.)
• Automatically error handling in the background for missing software, privileges and more
• Translation to simplified Chinese and Japanese
• A lot of improvements and bugfixes
